text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— Phew! The position of my elbow, my fingertips…… Ah!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ngh… hah, hah…… It's still not good enough. I've got to keep focus, all the way from my fingertips to the very end of my tail…!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: KAWAKAMIIIII——!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— Wuehh!? Ms. Urara…!? Y-Y-Y-You totally startled me…! W-What's going on, what happened?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey! I want you to teach me the trick to using an Ōdachi!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
First off, as mentioned in PriFighter's hot-blooded training 
episode, "If you want to get stronger, you've got to eat!"!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: To master the Ōdachi, power and weight are crucial! You need to eat and build up your body!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Roger that! Bon appétit!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
To wield a sword, having a strong grip is key! Hold it like you're 
going to crush it! Work on building up your strength like this!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I'm going to crush it!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Bam, bam…! Bam～…… Eep… I'm starting to feel a bit sick……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oof… I think I might have overdone it with the food just now… Blech…… M-Maybe we should take a little break……

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wa-phew… I'm so tired… But hehe, I feel a bit stronger now!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I'm honored to have been of help!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Thanks! Kawakami, if there's anything I can 
help you with, just let me know, okay?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, yeah. Hehe, actually, I'm a bit stuck at the moment.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I just can't seem to execute it like Madam King… 
It's really quite embarrassing……

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat, that's not true! I mean, the way you are 
right now, you're just like King, Kawakami!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Wha……?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: King was suuper pumped even before the training camp started! So when she lost her role, she felt really sad about it.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: She had the same look on her face as when she loses a race. She was all "grrr", full of frustration.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
But you see, King is really amazing! No matter how frustrated 
she gets, by the next day, she's full of energy again! She never 
gives up and keeps trying her best!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Your frustrated face looks just like King's, Kawakami! 
That's why I'm sure you'll be able to do it too!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I'm… just like Madam King……?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: …… I really made a fool of myself there.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Just being a substitute for Madam King isn't enough — it's not 
just about filling the role. I need to carry on Madam King's 
vision and intent, too……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I need to take on all her feelings of frustration, her strength 
in never giving up, and channel them into creating something 
even more amazing…!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll give it my all too! Let's work hard 
together and put on an amazing show!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes, an amazing show! …Oh, but… 
I wonder if it's really okay this way?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: What Madam King really wanted was ——

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Let's do the "traditional" version after all!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: !? What's gotten into the two of you!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
Just now… Teio and I were looking through some old 
documents, and… we found a video of the president, 
which is why…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
We want to do it the "traditional" way! Otherwise, it just 
wouldn't feel right! 'Cause Prez really livened up her own 
Festival of Illustrious Equines with the same performance!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
If we're going to carry the torch and make it even bigger, 
we have to do it in its "traditional" form… otherwise, there's 
no point! That's why ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I-I feel the same way! I want to carry on Madam King's wishes 
properly! I will step up to do the "traditional" Votive Stage Play 
that Madam King wanted to perform……!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: —— ! Hehe, it's like our feelings are in sync!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, let's do it! It's like we're doing something 
similar to the Shirabyōshi, and that's so exciting!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Similar……?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh… I see. 
So that's why we dedicate this story……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
The feeling of wanting to succeed and follow in the footsteps 
of someone you admire is probably the same in any era…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……! I guess the Shirabyōshi was carrying these feelings 
bubbling up from the depths of her heart as well…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
—— Let's give it our all! Let's put all our 
emotions into this Votive Stage Play!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
In that case, we need to convince King too! 
I'm sure she'll understand ——

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text:
Actually, I think King is the one who wants to 
perform it the "traditional" way the most here!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hh… Huuuh!? You guys, we're running out of time before the main event, you know?! It's finally started to come together, and now, all of a sudden……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Please allow us to make this happen!! 
I'll do my best, even if it means pushing myself to the limit!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm absolutely going to make it happen! I'll turn this into the greatest stage they'll ever see! Remember our promise when we watched the Kagura dance at the harvest festival?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……… Siiigh. Alright, I get it. If you all are that adamant about it, then I have no right to stop you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But… as the lead, it will be particularly challenging for you. 
Are you prepared for it?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm totally up for this!! With all due respect, 
I'll take on Madam King's wishes——!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wait. …I feel compelled to express this to you, 
especially since you're taking on my role.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Kawakami, I have faith in your abilities. I believe you can 
accomplish this more admirably than anyone else. So ——

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— I'm entrusting you with my role.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……! Yes, m'am. It's an honor…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Okay, if we're going to do this, we really are going 
to push ourselves to the limit. I'll support you 
with everything I've got too… so be prepared!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: —— ! Yeah, let's do our best!!

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Whooo!!
